title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Definitions and concepts: Conservation, preservation, restoration, reconstruction and adaptation. International framework of conservation: Venice Charter, Burra Charter. Introduction to traditional building materials, causes of decay and deterioration. Environmental influences: thermal effect, corrosion and oxidation, irradiation. Methodology for investigation, documentation and analysis of historic structures. Preparation of inspection reports; Techniques for restoration, preservation and rehabilitation. Listing and grading of heritage structures; Legal provisions for conservation of heritage resources; Management and presentation of heritage buildings.
